name: Evgenii Kurdakov
title: Senior Software Developer
summary: A seasoned Senior Front-End Developer with over 8 years of experience in designing and developing web applications. Expert in modern web technologies with a track record of leading dynamic development teams and serving as a key developer on 5+ enterprise projects. Excels at translating client requirements into functional designs and simplifying complex problems to deliver effective software solutions. Continuously learning and applying new technologies to optimize performance and improve user experience.

experience.companyDescription: Global leader in corporate travel management
experience.description: Building a platform enabling seamless virtual payment experience for business travelers with the ability to book travel for unprofiled travelers.
achievements: Architected and led development of a virtual payment platform serving thousands of business travelers
Led a cross-functional front-end team, improving delivery timelines and output quality
Implemented modern front-end solutions using React and TypeScript for scalable enterprise applications
Designed robust testing strategies ensuring reliability and high code quality

experience.companyDescription: Major banking institution in the Philippines

Designed and executed robust testing procedures for scalability and reliability
Maintained engineering excellence through detailed code reviews and best practices

experience.description: Discovery and planning for full-scale implementation of a new platform for Napoleon Games' expansion into the Netherlands market.
achievements: Led end-to-end platform development for Netherlands market expansion
Implemented modern front-end designs significantly enhancing UI/UX
Developed and optimized back-end integrations for seamless front-end to core system interaction
Led and mentored the front-end team, fostering collaboration and accelerating delivery
Refactored critical codebases improving readability, efficiency, and maintainability

experience.description: Digital Clinical Trials platform for the VA, improving functionality for healthcare professionals.
achievements: Engineered advanced features for a Digital Clinical Trials platform

Designed comprehensive testing workflows safeguarding clinical data integrity

achievements: Spearheaded end-to-end development of innovative features driving product value

experience.companyDescription: Global leader in digital platform engineering and software development
